argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matsca2.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_xpfi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_anidms | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_frlmsca | |- ( ( R e. V /\ ( N X. N ) e. Fin ) -> R = ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( ( N X. N ) e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> R = ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> R = ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 4 | #P_matsca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) ) = ( Scalar ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> R = ( Scalar ` A ) ) |
